Module fr.univartois.cril.juniverse
Package fr.univartois.cril.juniverse.optim

Interface IUniverseOptimizationSolver

All Superinterfaces:
IUniverseSolver
public interface IUniverseOptimizationSolver extends IUniverseSolver
The IUniversePseudoBooleanSolver interface defines the contract for optimization solvers.

    • getCurrentBound

      BigInteger getCurrentBound()
      Gives the current (best) bound that have been found by this solver. It is the current lower or upper bound, depending on whether the problem is a minimization or maximization problem.
      Returns:
      The current best bound.
      See Also:
      • isMinimization()
